name: FriscoSchoolAssistant
0:
”Alexa open Frisco School Assistant”
”Alexa Launch Frisco School Assistant”
”Alexa Start Frisco School Assistant”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: frisco school assistant
des: Ever wondered in the mornings, whether you should pack lunch for your kids or if they have the special they like in the lunch menu at school today? This skill enables Alexa to check the menu at Frisco ISD schools on demand. Ask Alexa “What's for lunch today?” or “What's for lunch at McSpedden Elementary on 16th March?” and hear the menu. No more fiddling webpages or navigating through apps!
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
